channel.title: G-H-IO
channel.description: Hey there this website is to show case what projects I have been working on recently. Thank you for visiting.

item.title: Premier league predictions using python
item.description:

item.title: World cup predictions update
item.description:
My World cup predictions using the telegraph predictor.

Group Stages

Round 16

Quarter Finals

Semi Finals

Final

France will win the World cup then… However knowing France and their tendancy to have problems in previous world cups they probably won’t be but I think they have the best squad.
